description: Create or update a record for a given model
label: Create or Update Record Object

options.name: mapping
options.label: Value Mapping
options.info: Mapping of values to properties for the created or updated record. The properties are based on the model selected.

options.name: mappingCreate
options.label: Value Mapping Create
options.info: Mapping of values to properties for the created record. The properties are based on the model selected.

options.name: mappingUpdate
options.label: Value Mapping Update
options.info: Mapping of values to properties for the updated record. The properties are based on the model selected.

options.name: as
options.label: As
options.info: The name of the variable you want for the newly created / updated record.

options.name: validates
options.label: Validates
options.info: Apply validations when creating or updating the record.
